whyChooseUs.title: Salt Tiles Manufacturer & Exporter
whyChooseUs.description: We are a leading manufacturer and exporter of Himalayan salt tiles. Our products are made from 100% natural Himalayan salt crystals that are hand-mined from the Khewra Salt Mines in Pakistan. We offer a wide range of salt tiles in various shapes and sizes to suit your needs. Our salt tiles are known for their natural beauty and health benefits, making them a popular choice for homes, spas, and wellness centers. Whether you are looking to add a touch of nature to your space or improve your health and well-being, our salt tiles are the perfect solution.

faqs.question: What are Himalayan salt tiles used for?
faqs.answer: Himalayan salt tiles are commonly used for wall decor, salt therapy rooms, spas, and even cooking surfaces.

faqs.question: How do Himalayan salt tiles improve air quality?
faqs.answer: Salt tiles naturally release negative ions that help purify the air by reducing dust, allergens, and pollutants.

faqs.question: Can I use salt tiles in my home?
faqs.answer: Yes, salt tiles are great for home decor, meditation spaces, and wellness areas to create a relaxing environment.

faqs.question: How do I maintain and clean salt tiles?
faqs.answer: Simply wipe them with a dry or slightly damp cloth. Avoid excess moisture to prevent dissolving.

faqs.question: Do salt tiles last forever?
faqs.answer: With proper care, salt tiles can last for years, but exposure to high humidity or water can erode them over time.
